title: Drawing, "Female Head, Left Profile; Eye Closed", ca. 1930s
description: Occupying most of the page, this left profile view shows a woman's head with chin tilted upward; lips slightly parted; aquiline nose; eye closed under a heavy, curved eyebrow; and hair waved over the ear, which is partly visible through the strands. The charcoal is applied thickly, especially in the hair framing the face, the cheek, the chin under part, and the abbreviated neck.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Female Head, Left Profile; Eye Closed", ca. 1930s.
ca. 1930s. Charcoal. Gift of Ellen Gustav Jensen. 1956-47-42.
